nodes.text: Pipa birds were a species of bird native to the planet Batuu. Their calls could be heard from within Black Spire Outpost or in the forests after sunrise. Some residents of Batuu raised pipa birds to be pets or for other reasons.

Pipa birds were created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. While not physically present in the park, sound clips of the birds' calls can be heard in certain areas.
